subject: [Radiance-general] Photon map
body:
I intend to use radiance to evaluate the performance of TDGS (Tubular Daylighting Guiding Systems) sometimes called lightpipes. I want to try forward ray tracing. I heard Radiance has something called Photon map. Where can I get that and how can I learn how to use it? 		 	   		  Thank you,Alejandro
